projectCollection: A collection of projects that showcase my technical skills and passion for creating impactful solutions.

projectList.title: Flowtrack
projectList.desc: Time management calendar app with tasks and habit tracking capabilities.
projectList.full_description: Flowtrack is a full-stack application built with Next.js, Prisma, and Tailwind CSS. It helps users manage their tasks and habits through a clean, fast interface. The app also includes analytics that highlight patterns in daily activity, making it easier to understand progress and stay consistent.

projectList.title: Seal
projectList.desc: Social media platform where users can share ideas and messages in real time.
projectList.full_description: Seal is a Twitter-like app where users can share short posts, find and befriend other users, and interact through comments and likes. It’s built with Next.js and Supabase, which enables real-time updates and a smooth, responsive experience.

projectList.title: Intellipic-lite
projectList.desc: AI Text to image app that uses Seedream 4 for the creation of digital avatars.
projectList.full_description: Intellipic-lite is a text-to-image web app built with Next.js and Supabase. It’s a simplified remake of my original project, Intellipic, which allowed users to finetune a Stable Diffusion XL model with any subject. The new version removes the finetuning step entirely while still delivering equally strong results.
